title: US-Based Firm Seeks Loan for Nvidia Chips for Use by Xiaohongshu
description: A US-based artificial intelligence firm is seeking a loan of about $300 million to help fund the purchase of advanced Nvidia Corp. chips for use in Japan by a Chinese client, according to people familiar with the matter, a rare case of financiers being tapped to support such deals.

title: EU risks missing the AI boat says Draghi

title: Is Infosys the ultimate ‘contra bet’ for 2026?
description: Infosys is guiding conservatively even as it continues to hire, win large deals and embed artificial intelligence across its operations. The disconnect between cautious guidance and steady execution suggests the company is positioning itself for the next up-cycle rather than reacting to current weakness.
content:
